Настоящие правила обязательны к исполнен: These rules are binding on small and medium-sized businesses as well as individuals who are not a party to the Agreement on the provision of a workplace, placing Coworking and other people on the territory of the INNWORK Coworking.
Нарушение (несоблюдение) настоящих прави: Violation (non-compliance) of these rules is grounds for temporary or permanent refusal to provide services and access to the premises to the visitor.
1.1. Посещение Коворкинга осуществляется: 1.1. A visit to the Coworking space is carried out after signing the contact. The Visitor is obliged to pay in the amount of the selected Tariff in the site.
1.2. На территорию коворкинга “INNWORK”: 1.2. tPersons under the influence of alcohol or drugs, as well as aggressive presenters, are not allowed into the territory of the INNWORK Coworking space.
1.3. При Аренде переговорной, бизнес-зал: 1.3. When renting a meeting room, business hall or training center for a month , you can spend no more than four hours in the Coworking space per day.
1.4. Режим работы Коворкинга устанавлива: 1.4. The operating hours of the Coworking space are established in accordance with the production calendar for the current year, developed on the basis of Articles 117 of the Labor Code of the Republic of Armenia.
2. Порядок приема и возврата рабочего ме: 2․ The procedure for accepting and returning a workplace in the Coworking space.
2.1. До начала использования рабочего ме: 2.1. Before using the workplace, a visitor to a Coworking space conducts a visual inspection of it.
2.2. При завершении работы посетитель об: 2.2. Upon completion of work, the visitor is obliged to put the workplace in proper shape, remove all electronic information belonging to him from the computer and other equipment of the Contractor, otherwise the Contractor is not responsible for the confidentially, further use, distribution or destruction of such information.
2.3. При истечении срока пользования раб: 2.3. Upon expiration of the period of use of the workplace, the visitor is obliged to hand over the workplace to the Contractor in proper condition on the last working day of his stay in the Coworking Space.
3.Правила нахождения в Коворкинге: 3․ Rules for staying in the Coworking Space.
3.1. Посетитель Коворкинга при пользован: 3.1 The visitor to a Coworking space, when using a workplace, must be guarded by these Rules and comply with the norms of current legislation, as well as use the workplace and the provided equipment for their intended purpose.
3.2. Посетитель обязан поддерживать чист: 3.2 The visitor is obliged to maintain cleanliness and order in workplaces and public places. Drinking coffee, tea and other non-alcoholic drinks or eating food is not allowed at the workplace. They are also obliged not to leave unwashed dishes, leftover food and drinks in common areas.
3.3. Посетитель обязан бережно относитьс: 3.3. The Visitor is obliged to take care of all equipment, office equipment, furniture, materials and energy resources of the Coworking Space. In case of damage to equipment or office equipment, we are obliged to compensate its cost or damage caused.
3.4. Посетитель Коворкинга вправе исполь: 3.4. A Coworking visit has the right to use his own property with prior agreement with the Contractor.
3.5. Запрещается находиться в Коворкинге: 3.5 It is prohibited to be in the Coworking Space under the influence of alcohol, drugs or toxic substances.
3.6. Запрещается курить (в том числе эле: 3.6 Smoking (including electronic cigarettes, vapes, etc.) is prohibited on the premises. There is a specially designated place for this.
3.7. Запрещается переставлять инвентарь: 3.7 Rearranging inventory and equipment in the Coworking Space without prior approval from the Contractor is prohibited.
3.8. Запрещается входить в Коворкинг с ж: 3.8. Entering the Coworking Space with animals, with the exception of users who are visually impaired
3.9. Находясь в Коворкинге при проведени: 3.9. While in the Coworking space during negotiations (including using a mobile phone), it is recommended not to talk too loudly so as not interfere with the work of others and to observe generally accepted rules of decency.
3.10. Находясь в Коворкинге телефоны и п: 3.10. While in the Coworking space, phones and other personal communication devices should be set to silent or vibrate mode. Viewing and listening to multimedia files is allowed using headphones.
3.11. Запрещено находиться без защитной: 3.11. Being without a protective mask if you are suffering from ARVI, influenza and other diseases transmitted by airborne droplets, exposing other visitors to the risk of infection.
